casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF Robert W. STEIN, an Attorney at Law (Attorney No. 015951994) D-144 September Term 2017
081238 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 25, 2018

ORDER

This matter having been duly presented, it is ORDERED that ROBERT W. STEIN of CHELTENHAM, PENNSYLVANIA, who was admitted to the bar of this State in 1994, and who was suspended from the practice of law for a period of three years retroactive to May 9, 2012, by Order of this Court filed July 20, 2017, be restored to the practice of law, effective immediately.
